body:
As many people knew, I was used to relog, thats why I have a large list of infractions, the point is that as I had a K/D of 10.1 I decided to make me an own punishment, this one consisted on lowing my K/D all the way down as it was before, and I made it, my K/D is 4.8 now, I think this effort made me learn relog isnt important, and its way to bad cause makes many people mad.

Example:
(Random guy running after me)
Guy: Yes, finally killed you.
Me: You sure? Boom (Relogs)
Guy: ** Fag..

So I just wanted to say sorry too for this bad thing I made.. :P
Thanks for reading. :#

title: Making Things Fair
